channel.title: Mission Calculator
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Mission Calculator" - Determine your probability of passing a mission.

item.title: Re: Mission Calculator
item.content:encoded:
Ren Po Ken has moved his calculator to a different host. The new location is:
Calculator

He's in the process of revamping it, and mentioned to me that this version hasn't been updated in a while. If it's buggy, let me know and I'll release the one attached to Moon village's FAQ; it is the most current, other than the beta he's working on.

item.title: Mission Calculator
item.content:encoded:
Link to the calculator.

I found this calculator very useful for determining my success probability on harder missions (right now, mostly trying to level Timmy, Billy, and Pinky to level 2). I thought people might want access to it from here.
